--- pagetitle: "2025 American Psychology-Law Society Conference" toc: false css: index.css editor: source description: | The annual conference for the American Psychology-Law Society for 2025 will be held in San Juan, PR from March 13-15. includesource: true --- :::::: column-screen ::::: hero-banner :::: content-block # 2025 Annual Conference of the American Psychology-Law Society ### {{< fa location-dot aria-hidden="true" >}} San Juan, Puerto Rico ### {{< fa calendar aria-hidden="true" >}} March 13-15, 2025 ::: hero-buttons [Register here!](https://apls.memberclicks.net/2025aplsconferenceregistration#!/){#btn-guide .btn-action .btn-action .btn .btn-success role="button"} [DRAFT Program](#schedule){.btn-action .btn .btn-secondary role="button"} ::: :::: ::::: :::::: ::: column-screen ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: # General Information {#info} ::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa circle-info aria-hidden="true" >}} Welcome! ![](images/2025-pr-announcement.png) ::: ::: vspace ::: ::::: column-screen :::: {.simple-info-blue .alt-background-blue} ::: content-block-blue ##### Want to learn more about the [AP-LS Annual Conference]{.highlight}? [Learn More {{< fa arrow-right aria-hidden="true" >}}](archive/index.qmd){.btn-action .btn .btn-secondary .btn-lg role="button"} ::: :::: ::::: ::: vspace ::: # Submissions {#proposals} ::: vspace ::: ::::::::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa bullhorn aria-hidden="true" >}} Call for Proposals ::: vspace ::: ::: simple-info-center [2025 Call for Proposals]{.plenary} [Annual Conference of the American Psychology-Law Society (AP-LS)
March 13-15, 2025 \| San Juan, Puerto Rico \| Sheraton Puerto Rico Resort & Casino]{.event-time} [{{< fa file-pdf aria-hidden="true" >}} Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/19-jPv9SXVbnE5ofgZZis9e4ZZkvkwqli/view?usp=sharing){.btn .btn-outline-primary role="button"} ::: ::: {.callout-important appearance="simple"} ## Submissions for the 2025 Conferences are now CLOSED! ::: ::: vspace ::: [Reviewers]{.plenary} ::: session-description **Reviewers:** Reviewers are invited for all content areas including both professional and graduate student reviewers. Proposals will be distributed for review at the end of October. Please sign up to be a reviewer using the submission portal when you submit your proposal, or, if you do not plan to submit a proposal, using this [Google form](https://forms.gle/vUZyXUDbT6ydYVr67). ::: ::: vspace ::: > If you have any questions or comments about the conference, please contact the conference co-chairs at [conference\@ap-ls.org](mailto:conference@ap-ls.org) Looking forward to seeing everyone in March!

*2025 AP-LS Conference Co-Chairs*
Jenni Cox & Lori Hoetger Fendrick ::::::::: ::: vspace :::
::: vspace ::: # Program & Schedule {#schedule} ::: vspace ::: ::::::::::: simple-info-center ::::::::::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa circle-info aria-hidden="true" >}} Overview ::: vspace ::: ##### [2025 APLS DRAFT Program Grid]{.highlight}
is now available! [View Here {{< fa arrow-right aria-hidden="true" >}}](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1omzJ6uTXgQ8uJOPkrbH2ENhyk-ZwQiaH/view?usp=sharing){.btn .btn-outline-primary role="button"} ::: vspace ::: ::::::::::: ::::::::::: ::::::::::: simple-info # Hotel Information {#hotel} :::::::::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa hotel aria-hidden="true" >}} Sheraton Puerto Rico Resort & Casino ::: vspace ::: ::: session-description The 2025 AP-LS Conference will be held at the [Sheraton Puerto Rico Resort & Casino](https://www.marriott.com/en-us/hotels/sjusi-sheraton-puerto-rico-hotel-and-casino/overview/what-to-expect/) ::: ![](https://dynamic-media-cdn.tripadvisor.com/media/photo-o/28/38/ab/9e/hotel-exterior.jpg?w=1200&h=-1&s=1){fig-align="center" fig-alt="Exterior view of the Sheraton"} ::: vspace ::: [Conference Rates]{.plenary} ::::: session-description AP-LS has rooms set aside for all attendees, which can be booked at a special group rate that is available for attendees: {{< fa credit-card aria-hidden="true" >}} Group Rate \$259 to \$559 USD/night
{{< fa calendar aria-hidden="true" >}} Available March 6 - March 18
::: hero-buttons [{{< fa bell-concierge aria-hidden="true" >}} Book a Room](https://www.marriott.com/event-reservations/reservation-link.mi?id=1710272897155&key=GRP&app=resvlink){.btn-action .btn .btn-info .ml-auto role="button"} [{{< fa hotel aria-hidden="true" >}} Website](https://maps.app.goo.gl/Fa5b26tUKbZRk8Eu5){.btn-action .btn .btn-dark .ml-auto role="button"} ::: ::: callout-tip Attendees must book their room by **February 17th, 2025** to take advantage of the special rate! ::: ::::: ::: vspace ::: :::::::::: :::::::::::
::: vspace ::: # Registration {#register} :::::: simple-info-center :::::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa bullhorn >}} Info ### [{{< fa id-badge aria-hidden="true" >}} Online registration]{.highlight} is ***now*** open! ::: vspace ::: [Click Here {{< fa arrow-right-long aria-hidden="true" >}} ](https://apls.memberclicks.net/2025aplsconferenceregistration#!/){.btn .btn-outline-primary .ml-auto role="button"} ::: vspace ::: ## {{< fa circle-info >}} Pricing ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"} ## REGISTRATION RATES & INCLUSIONS \*Rates based on 2024 and may be subject to change +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+------------+ | Status | Early Bird\ | Regular\ | | | (before Jan 31) | (on Feb 1) | +:========================================+:================+:===========+ | Full Member | \$345 | \$380 | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+------------+ | Early Career Professional Member | \$240 | \$270 | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+------------+ | Student Member | \$90 | \$125 | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+------------+ | Student Member *First-Author Presenter* | \$70 | \$70 | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+------------+ | Student Non-member | \$170 | \$210 | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+------------+ | Non-member | \$490 | \$575 | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+------------+ ::: :::::: :::::::
::: vspace ::: # Preconference Workshops {#preconference} :::::: simple-info-center ::::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa bullhorn aria-hidden="true" >}} Info ##### [{{< fa calendar aria-hidden="true" >}} Wednesday, March 12, 2025]{.highlight} ::: vspace ::: [Learn More {{< fa arrow-right-long aria-hidden="true" >}} ](preconference/index.qmd){.btn .btn-outline-primary .ml-auto role="button"} ::: vspace ::: *Attendees will have the ability to register for the pre conference workshops with their conference registration.* ::: vspace ::: ## {{< fa circle-info >}} Pricing ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"} ## REGISTRATION RATES & INCLUSIONS \*Rates based on 2024 and may be subject to change ### Full-Day Workshop Rates +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Status | Early Bird\ | Regular\ | | | (before Jan 31) | (on Feb 1) | +:===================+:================+:===============+ | Member | \$200 | \$230 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Non-Member | \$250 | \$280 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Student Member | \$80 | \$100 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Student Non-member | \$100 | \$120 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | | | | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ ### Half-Day Workshop Rates +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Status | Early Bird\ | Regular\ | | | (before Jan 31) | (on Feb 1) | +:===================+:================+:===============+ | Member | \$100 | \$115 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Non-Member | \$125 | \$140 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Student Member | \$40 | \$50 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Student Non-member | \$50 | \$60 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ ::: ::::: ::::::
